Mutate could tell this guy was neither bluffing, nor flying at his 
maximum speed. Mutate had never been especially fast in the air (he 
was even slower on the ground until Rhesus fixed his legs). He could 
probably lure this guy in close and send out a wave of energy, and 
that might even finish him. Still, before that had almost fried 
Rampage AND Silverbolt (he wouldn't know Rampage was immortal). He 
flew at the fastest speed he could manage around Megatron and aimed 
at his jet pack hoping to gain the airial advantage by grounding his 
opponent. He pulled the trigger and a bolt went at Megatron.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> The stun pistol slammed into Megatron shaking him slightly, and he
> seemed to have problems moving his fusion cannon arm. Through the 
raging
> red eyes he looked at the Mutate, and began to hoover towards him, 
his
> functioning hand gripped tightly. "I will rend your horrid body 
with my
> bare hands." He whispered.
